titles.title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to clarify the classification of linear alkylbenzene sulfonates and linear alkylbenzene sulfonic acid.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E564)

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 2/17/1993--Introduced. Amends the Tariff Schedule of the United States to revise the classification of linear alkylbenzene sulfonates and linear alkylbenzene sulfonic acids.
